# awesome-wrap



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Shadow Parts

| Part      | Description                                                |
| --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- |
| `"inner"` | The inner container element that wraps all child elements. |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                  | Description                                                             |
| ------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `--awesome-view-breakpoint-lg`        | The view breakpoint for lg. (Default: 960)                              |
| `--awesome-view-breakpoint-md`        | The view breakpoint for md. (Default: 720)                              |
| `--awesome-view-breakpoint-sm`        | The view breakpoint for sm. (Default: 540)                              |
| `--awesome-view-breakpoint-xl`        | The view breakpoint for xl. (Default: 1140)                             |
| `--awesome-view-breakpoint-xs`        | The view breakpoint for xs. (Default: 0)                                |
| `--awesome-view-breakpoint-xxl`       | The view breakpoint for xxl. (Default: 1320)                            |
| `--awesome-wrap-inner-breakpoint-lg`  | The inner breakpoint of lg. (Default to --awesome-view-breakpoint-lg)   |
| `--awesome-wrap-inner-breakpoint-md`  | The inner breakpoint of md. (Default to --awesome-view-breakpoint-md)   |
| `--awesome-wrap-inner-breakpoint-sm`  | The inner breakpoint of sm. (Default to --awesome-view-breakpoint-sm)   |
| `--awesome-wrap-inner-breakpoint-xl`  | The inner breakpoint of xl. (Default to --awesome-view-breakpoint-xl)   |
| `--awesome-wrap-inner-breakpoint-xs`  | The inner breakpoint of xs. (Default to --awesome-view-breakpoint-xs)   |
| `--awesome-wrap-inner-breakpoint-xxl` | The inner breakpoint of xxl. (Default to --awesome-view-breakpoint-xxl) |
| `--awesome-wrap-outer-breakpoint-lg`  | The outer breakpoint of lg. (Default: 992)                              |
| `--awesome-wrap-outer-breakpoint-md`  | The outer breakpoint of md. (Default: 768)                              |
| `--awesome-wrap-outer-breakpoint-sm`  | The outer breakpoint of sm. (Default: 576)                              |
| `--awesome-wrap-outer-breakpoint-xl`  | The outer breakpoint of xl. (Default: 1200)                             |
| `--awesome-wrap-outer-breakpoint-xs`  | The outer breakpoint of xs. (Default: 0)                                |
| `--awesome-wrap-outer-breakpoint-xxl` | The outer breakpoint of xxl. (Default: 1400)                            |
